name: language-translator
description: Introducing our i18n language translation package! Our package allows you to easily translate your web or mobile application into multiple languages using a simple JSON file. With support for over 50 languages, our package makes it easy to reach a global audience and improve user experience. Whether you're a developer or a business owner, our package is the perfect solution for streamlining your localization efforts and boosting your international presence.
author: Muhammad Aqib
